statement_text: Agriculture Victoria, in a statement, linked the strain detected at the poultry farm in the Terang region to that reported at the egg farm in Meredith, where it [Agriculture Victoria] said 'the H7N3 high pathogenic strain of avian influenza virus has resulted in numerous poultry deaths'.
